Test description: Routine status checks do not trigger notifications.
Notes: There are no violation events for these person records.

Test description: Tamper events trigger notifications.
Notes: A tamper event is raised and is never cancelled.

Test description: Tamper events trigger notifications if not cancelled within a given threshold.
Notes: We define the threshold arbitrarily here at 2 minutes. A tamper event is raised, and only cancelled 3m later.

Test description: Tamper events do not trigger notifications if cancelled before the threshold is crossed.
Notes: A tamper event is detected but is cancelled 1m later.

Test description: Test conditions 2 & 4
Notes: Record 5 ("Ew") triggers three separate tamper events, only two of which are cancelled.

Test description: Curfew absence events trigger notifications if not cancelled.
Curfew absence events trigger notifications if not cancelled within the threshold time.
Notes: We arbitrarlly set the threshold time as 10 minutes. Here, the cancelling event arrives only after 12 minutes.

Test description: Curfew absence events do not trigger notifications if cancelled within the threshold time.
Notes: Note the variety of event_names related to curfew absence events and their cancellation.

Test description: Exclusion violation events trigger notifications if not cancelled.
Exclusion zone violations trigger notifications if not cancelled within the threshold time.
Notes: We arbitrarlly set this threshold time at 5 minutes. The cancelling event arrives only after 7 minutes.

Test description: Exclusion violation events do not trigger notifications if cancelled within the threshold time.
Notes: Note the variety of event_names related to exclusion zone violation events and their cancellation.

Test description: Test conditions 2 & 5
Notes: Both a tamper and a curfew violation occur, and are not cancelled.

Test description: Test conditions 2 & 8
Notes: A tamper event and exclusion violation occur, and are not cancelled

Test description: Test conditions 5 & 8
Notes: A curfew violation and exclusion violation occur, and are not cancelled.

Test description: Test conditions 4 & 5
Notes: A tamper event occurs during a curfew violation, but is cancelled within the threshold time

Test description: Test conditions 4 & 8
Notes: A tamper event occurs during an exclusion zone violation, but is cancelled within the threshold time

Test description: Test conditions 5 & 10
Notes: The offender is both absent from an inclusion zone and present in an exclusion zone, but the exclusion violation is cancelled within the threshold time.

Test description: Low-battery alerts trigger notifications
Notes: A low-battery alert is raised and is never cancelled.

Test description: Low-battery alerts trigger notifications if not cancelled within the threshold time. We define the threshold time here arbitrarily as **2 minutes**.
Notes: A low-battery alert is raised and only cancelled 10 minutes later.

Test description: Low-battery alerts do not trigger notifications if cancelled within the threshold time.
Notes: A low-battery alert is raised but cancelled within 1 minute.

Test description: (Test conditions 7 & 13)
Notes: Alerts are raised both for absence from a curfew and low battery. However, the offender arrives home and begins charging his device immediately.

Test description: (Test conditions 9 & 11)
Notes: Alerts are raised for entry into an exclusion zone and for low battery. The offender quickly leaves the exclusion zone within the threshold time, but never addresses the low-battery issue.
